about_the_game:
Have you ever dreamed of what it would be like to build your own house? Or maybe just your own gazebo, shed, or outdoor fireplace? What would it look like, and how much could it cost? The House Master will answer all these questions and more!

You work with real building materials and dimensions and prepare your home project according to yourself! In this game, you can create your own project and present it according to yourself. House Master has its own library of materials, trees, and all building elements, which we will keep adding.

Buy House Master once and receive lifelong updates.
detailed_description:
Have you ever dreamed of what it would be like to build your own house? Or maybe just your own gazebo, shed, or outdoor fireplace? What would it look like, and how much could it cost? The House Master will answer all these questions and more!

You work with real building materials and dimensions and prepare your home project according to yourself! In this game, you can create your own project and present it according to yourself. House Master has its own library of materials, trees, and all building elements, which we will keep adding.

Buy House Master once and receive lifelong updates.
name: House Master

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Processor: Intel Core i5 3470 @ 3.2 GHz | AMD FX 8120 @ 3.9 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 | AMD RX 590, with 4GB VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Processor: Intel Core i5 4690 @ 3.5 GHz | AMD Ryzen 5 1600x @ 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 | AMD RX 590, with 4GB VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
